comments.html:
Wow, this 100% resonates with me and my similar deeply ingrained beliefs.

Many people on the podcast turn up without having read Ramit’s book about personal finance. The thought of this makes me shudder. If I were to go on IWTYTBR, I would have read the book, implemented it, and be reporting back to Ramit how well I’m following his instructions, and he would just be commending me on what a good job I’d done.

Absolutely hilarious, and too true!
